weekend_tours.title: Weekend Getaway Tours
weekend_tours.subtitle: Explore India's most beautiful destinations in just a weekend
weekend_tours.description: Our carefully curated weekend packages let you escape the routine and discover incredible destinations across India. Perfect for busy professionals looking for quick rejuvenation without taking extended time off work.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Exploration
itinerary.description: Arrive at your destination, check into your hotel, and begin exploring the local attractions. Enjoy a welcome dinner featuring local cuisine to kickstart your weekend adventure.

itinerary.title: Full Day Excursion
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day tour of major attractions. Experience the culture, cuisine, and natural beauty of the destination with guided tours and free time for personal exploration.

itinerary.title: Leisure & Departure
itinerary.description: Morning at leisure to relax or explore nearby spots at your own pace. Check out from the hotel by noon and depart with beautiful memories of your weekend getaway.

highlights: Curated experiences to maximize your limited time
Perfect balance of guided tours and free time
Option to extend your stay with customized add-ons

accommodations.name: Goa Beach Resort
accommodations.description: Beachfront property with modern amenities and stunning ocean views. Features swimming pool, spa, and multiple dining options.

accommodations.name: Udaipur Heritage Hotel
accommodations.description: Converted palace offering royal hospitality with lakeside views, traditional architecture, and authentic Rajasthani experiences.

accommodations.name: Munnar Tea Estate Stay
accommodations.description: Cozy cottages amidst rolling tea plantations with misty mountain views, organic dining, and nature trails.

accommodations.name: Rishikesh Riverside Resort
accommodations.description: Serene property on the banks of the Ganges with yoga facilities, adventure sports access, and spiritual ambiance.

destinations.name: Goa Beach Weekend
destinations.description: Experience the vibrant beach life of Goa with its golden sands, water sports, and famous nightlife. Explore Portuguese heritage in Old Goa, enjoy fresh seafood, and relax with beachside cocktails in this perfect tropical getaway.

activities: Arrival at Goa airport and transfer to beach resort
Welcome drink and check-in
Evening at Calangute or Baga Beach
Seafood dinner at beachside shack
Morning visit to Old Goa churches (Basilica of Bom Jesus and Se Cathedral)
Spice plantation tour with traditional Goan lunch
Afternoon cruise on Mandovi River with cultural performances
Evening free for beach activities or nightlife exploration
Morning at leisure for swimming or water sports
Visit to Anjuna flea market (if Wednesday) or Fort Aguada
Lunch at local restaurant
Departure for airport

destinations.name: Udaipur Royal Retreat
destinations.description: Discover the romantic city of Udaipur with its majestic palaces, serene lakes, and royal heritage. Explore the City Palace, enjoy boat rides on Lake Pichola, and experience the rich culture of Rajasthan in this perfect weekend escape.

activities: Arrival and check-in at heritage hotel
Visit to City Palace and Crystal Gallery
Boat ride on Lake Pichola with views of Lake Palace
Evening cultural performance at Bagore Ki Haveli
Dinner at rooftop restaurant with lake views
Morning visit to Saheliyon Ki Bari and Jagdish Temple
Shopping at local markets for handicrafts and textiles
Lunch at traditional Rajasthani restaurant
Visit to Monsoon Palace for sunset views
Departure

destinations.name: Rishikesh Spiritual & Adventure
destinations.description: Combine spiritual awakening with adventure in Rishikesh, the yoga capital of the world. Participate in yoga and meditation sessions, witness the magical Ganga Aarti, and enjoy thrilling white-water rafting on the sacred Ganges River.

activities: Arrival and check-in at riverside resort
Visit to Beatles Ashram and Triveni Ghat
Evening Ganga Aarti ceremony at Parmarth Niketan
Dinner at organic café
Morning yoga session by the Ganges
White-water rafting expedition (16km stretch)
Visit to Laxman Jhula and Ram Jhula
Evening meditation session
Bonfire dinner
Sunrise trek to Kunjapuri Temple
Visit to local ashram for spiritual discourse
Lunch at riverside café
Free time for ayurvedic massage or shopping
Departure

destinations.name: Lonavala Mountain Escape
destinations.description: Retreat to the misty mountains of Lonavala, a popular hill station near Mumbai and Pune. Explore ancient caves, enjoy panoramic viewpoints, and savor the famous Lonavala chikki while enjoying the cool climate and lush greenery.

activities: Arrival and check-in at mountain resort
Visit to Tiger's Leap and Duke's Nose viewpoints
Afternoon visit to Karla and Bhaja Caves
Evening tea with pakoras at Lonavala Lake
Dinner at resort with mountain views
Morning visit to Rajmachi Fort (short trek)
Stop at Bushi Dam and Lion's Point
Shopping for Lonavala chikki and fudge
Lunch at local restaurant
Departure
